channel.title: Need help on commands for owners

item.title: Need help on commands for owners
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:

else if(command.startsWith("bann")) { String victim = command.substring(4); PlayerHandler.banNick = victim; victim = victim.replace(" ", "_"); //System.out.println("**********************************************************"); //System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); //System.out.println("**********************************************************"); appendToBanned(victim); }
